name: : 3rd Edition of International Conference on Occupational Health & Safety
content: Frigate Conferences takes immense pleasure & feels honored in inviting contributors from across the globe to the "3rd Edition of International Conference on Occupational Health & Safety’’ to be held during November 13-14, 2024 in Amsterdam, Netherlands, on the theme "Workplace Health & Safety: Excellence in Research and Innovation''. Occupational Health & Safety 2024 will include prompt Keynote Presentations, Oral Presentations, Poster Presentations, Young Research Forum, Workshops, and Exhibitions. Occupational Health 2024, the Organizing committee is enthusiastic about this forthcoming conference including plenary lectures, poster presentations, symposia, and workshops on the relevant topics and various programs for participants from all over the world. We invite you to associate with us at the Occupational Health 2024, where you will be sure to have significant involvement with researchers and scholars from around the world. All Organizing Committee Members of the Occupational Health 2024 look forward to meeting you in London, UK. Feel free to contact us for any further assistance/queries, Thanks & Regards Name: Sarah Williams | Project Manager Emails: info@frigateconferences.com Phone: +44-208 095 0177
